name: GrayscaleMorphologicalClosingImageFilter
doc: Performs morphological closing in a grayscale image.

members.name: SafeBorder
members.detaileddescriptionSet: A safe border is added to input image to avoid borders effects and remove it once the closing is done
members.detaileddescriptionGet: A safe border is added to input image to avoid borders effects and remove it once the closing is done

briefdescription: gray scale dilation of an image
detaileddescription:
Erode an image using grayscale morphology. Dilation takes the maximum of all the pixels identified by the structuring element.

The structuring element is assumed to be composed of binary values (zero or one). Only elements of the structuring element having values > 0 are candidates for affecting the center pixel.

\see  MorphologyImageFilter, GrayscaleFunctionErodeImageFilter, BinaryErodeImageFilter
